sentence: Ryan is considered the favorite for the Democratic nomination in a very small primary field that includes progressive Morgan Harper, who is a former Consumer Financial Protection Bureau senior adviser and a 2020 congressional candidate.
author: Terresa Monroe-Hamilton
title: JD Vance massively triggers left with glowing MTG endorsement, vow to take country back from ‘scumbags’

sentence: Longtime Democratic Rep. Tim Ryan of northeastern Ohio is the front-runner in a small field of contenders that also includes progressive Morgan Harper, a former Consumer Financial Protection Bureau senior adviser and 2020 congressional candidate, Whoever wins the GOP primary will likely be considered the favorite in November’s general election in Ohio, a one-time premiere battleground state that Trump won by eight points in both his 2016 presidential election and his 2020 reelection defeat.
author: Paul Steinhauser
title: Trump helps narrow field in crowded Ohio Republican Senate primary

sentence: Ryan is considered the favorite for the Democratic nomination in race that also includes progressive Morgan Harper, a former Consumer Financial Protection Bureau senior adviser and 2020 congressional candidate.
title: Super PAC spending $1.4 million to reintroduce J.D. Vance to Ohio voters in GOP Senate showdown

sentence: The winning Republican will face off with the winner of the Democratic primary, likely either Morgan Harper or U.S. Rep. Tim Ryan (D-Ohio).
author: Taylor Giorno
title: Ohio’s Republican Senate primary attracts big money as tensions boil over ahead of Saturday Trump rally

sentence: "The entire Ohio GOP Senate race has focused only on Trump’s endorsement instead of how any of these Republicans would improve the lives of Ohioans, " Democrat U.S. Senate candidate Morgan Harper wrote in a statement.
title: Former President Donald Trump holds rally in Ohio
